long_desc: You gaze in awe at the most beautiful of all angels, Iblis, the Fallen.
flags_raw: He smiles calmly, and begins to tell you of the time when he would not
stats1_raw: kneel, would not prostrate himself before the first human beings.  And
stats2_raw: then he gestures at you, smiling, and conjures an image of all the
stats3_raw: temptations that will be yours if you in turn but follow him.
